memberdef.argsstring:
(function() { firebase.auth().onAuthStateChanged((user)=> { if(user) { currentUser=user.email;} });ref.once("value", function(snapshot) { snapshot.forEach(function(data) { if(data.val().clientId===currentUser) { var key=data.key var number='No.'+data.val().reservationNumber;var hospital=data.val().hospital;var purpose=data.val().purpose;var time=data.val().date+' '+data.val().time;var completion=data.val().completion;var strArray=data.val().date.split('-');var cancel=data.val().cancel;var petName=data.val().petName;if(isExpired(strArray, data.val().time.replace("시", ""))) { ref.child(key).update({ completion:'true' });} if(completion==='false' &&cancel !=='true') { $("#card-area").append("
"+"

"+petName+"

"+"

"+purpose+"

"+time+"

"+"
"+" Modify "+" Cancel "+"

");} if(completion==='true'||cancel==='true') { if(exist===false) { document.getElementById("cancel_text").textContent="Last reservations & Cancelled reservations" exist=true;} $("#cancel-area").append("
"+"

"+"

"+hospital+"

"+"

"+petName+"

"+"

"+purpose+"

"+"

"+time+"

");} } });});var hos_name;var area_name;var root=firebase.database().ref("User/Admin/");root.on("value", function(snapshot) { snapshot.forEach(function(data) { if(data.val().email==firebase.auth().currentUser.email){ hos_name=data.val().hospital_name;area_name=data.val().area;} });});setTimeout(function(){ ref.once("value", function(snapshot) { snapshot.forEach(function(data) { if(data.val().hospital==hos_name &&data.val().area==area_name) { var key=data.key var number='No.'+data.val().reservationNumber;var petName=data.val().petName;var petAge=data.val().petAge;var petGender=data.val().petGender;var petSpecies=data.val().petSpecies;var clientName=data.val().clientName;var purpose=data.val().purpose;var time=data.val().date+' '+data.val().time;var completion=data.val().completion;var phoneNum=data.val().phoneNum;var message=data.val().message;var strArray=data.val().date.split('-');var cancel=data.val().cancel;if(isExpired(strArray, data.val().time.replace("시", ""))) { ref.child(key).update({ completion:'true' });} if(completion==='false' &&cancel !=='true') { $("#card-area").append("

memberdef.name: ready

detaileddescription.para:
Ask if you really want to cancel and proceed with the cancellation.
param
ReservationDetail key in Firebase database

Touch the Modify button to go to the page where you want to modify the details.
param
ReservationDetail key in Firebase database

briefdescription.para: Method to confirm if this is a past reservation.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns 'true' over time compared to current time
param
Date, time to compare
